articles.author: Jim Teece
articles.description:
The Christmas season brought a deep chill to Southern Oregon’s renewable energy sector this week as Purelight Power, the Medford-based residential solar giant, announced the immediate cessation of all operations. The company, which had grown into one of the largest installers in the region, is moving toward a total liquidation under Chapter 7 bankruptcy, citing…
The post The Sun Sets on Purelight Power: Medford Headquarters Shutter as Federal Solar Credits Vanish appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.
articles.title: The Sun Sets on Purelight Power: Medford Headquarters Shutter as Federal Solar Credits Vanish

articles.author: Jim Teece
articles.description:
12/23/2025 Business Oregon is accepting applications for the Industrial Development Bond (IDB) program, a key financing tool designed to help Oregon manufacturers, processors, exempt facilities, and nonprofits grow, create jobs, and strengthen the state’s traded-sector economy. Oregon Industrial Development Bonds are tax-exempt revenue bonds issued by the state of Oregon that provide long-term financing for land, buildings,…
The post Application Process Open for Industrial Development Bond Program to Support Oregon Manufacturers appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.
articles.title: Application Process Open for Industrial Development Bond Program to Support Oregon Manufacturers
